TopicTitle: Remotetech 2 connected but cant control probe

Articles.Content: So i have an issue with remotetech 2 and i am certain that its not my mistake.I have a probe sitting on the launchpad, it is connected to KSC, but i can't control it.If i try to manually do something like decoupling a stage it says "No Target".I have 3 DP-10 antennas for atmospheric flight, a communotron and 2 DTS-M1 antennas, but no antenna seems to work.I have also tried with different probe bodies and none of them work at all.Any ideas whats the problem?
